subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tom Glavine, whose family continued to live in suburban Atlanta even after he signed with the Mets five years ago, agreed to a one-year, $8 million contract with the Braves, his former team.
snippet: Tom Glavine, whose family continued to live in suburban Atlanta even after he signed with the Mets five years ago, agreed to a one-year, $8 million contract with the Braves, his former team.
